dimensions: Warp x Weft: 18 x 27 cm (7 1/16 x 10 5/8 in.)
title: Sample
medium:
Medium: silk, wool
Technique: plain weave
description: Handwoven sample for plain-weave cloth with white silk warp and weft of undyed wool. The wool is hand-spun with great variation in thickness, giving a "slubbed" quality to the fabric.  Narrow band at top and bottom of plain weave with undyed cotton weft.
name: Sample
